summary: Visionary Executive Director with expertise in marketing communication, strategic planning, public relations, and managing complex multi-project initiatives across nonprofit organizations; experienced in budgeting, grant management, staff leadership, and building stakeholder relationships.

experience.title: Executive Director
experience.description: Executive leadership overseeing outreach, fundraising, strategic planning, fiscal and facility management, and staff development for a 501(c)3 organization; responsible for governance, program oversight, grant reporting, and acting as primary spokesperson.

experience.title: Executive Director
experience.description: Marketing and publications oversight; community outreach and advocacy; leadership in strategic planning, program management, fundraising, budgeting and GAAP compliance; led initiatives to increase visibility of the organization.

experience.title: Chief Writer, Editor and Photographer
experience.description: Oversaw external and internal communications; editor and chief writer and photographer for publications; led marketing efforts, content development, and branding; supported fundraising and donor communications.

experience.title: Co-Owner/Manager
experience.description: Managed business operations, including accounting, customer service, and marketing; oversaw facilities and operations.

education.degree: B.A. in English (with emphasis in writing) and Spanish, minor in mass communications
